channel.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
channel.description: Mod please remove this post. im tired of people applying for this and then saying the following! this is why: [3:26:37 AM] Saige: Alright, Im sorry but I don't want to work for you. I find that there are much better servers that I can join, Sorry and goodbye. [3:26:46 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: wtf [3:26:58 AM] Saige: You're not evening paying for a vps. [3:27:07 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: who said i wasnt [3:27:15 AM] Saige: You said before we need a host. [3:27:33 AM] Saige: You're going to portforward. [3:27:35 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: yea im not wasting money until this thing gets up [3:27:55 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: when it goes online therelll be a vps [3:28:00 AM] Saige: Alright, Im sorry then. I have earn't 1000's of dollars out of soul split and [3:28:29 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: D*** WHY THE **** IS IT ALWAYS ABOUT THE DAMN MONEY! So a mod or staff please close this post im tired of people trying to help and then all they want is money.If you still want to help you better pm me before this topic is closed.

item.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
item.dc:creator: @Taren Taren
item.description:
@Taren wrote:

Age:16
What you want to be called:Taren… IGN: Spooky
Skype/other form of contact:MSN: Sp00ki@hotmail.com I can also make skype if needed.
Experience:Many years of hosting.
What do you hope to get out of this project:Knowledge. I want to learn more about coding and pretty much everything.
Additional information: I have a desktop PC sitting next to me that works perfectly, has just received a clean installation of windows XP, and basically all this PC would be doing is hosting your server. It can host 24/7 around the clock. Hold plenty of players. It will be very stable. It has nearly 100 mb/s up+down speeds. I’ve been looking for a server to host because I want to put it to good use and I don’t use it for anything.
Also, I would be a beta tester and a loyal player

item.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
item.dc:creator: @Duky190 Duky190
item.description:
@Duky190 wrote:

Chrisl1924:

I love all these comments about what a server should have, etc, but you’re sorta raining on this guys parade. Give him some suggestions, some support, whatever, and then just let the topic play out. There is no need to argue among yourselves about what you think is the best way to run a server. If you think your ideas are so great, go run your own Now, I’m done with my rant, hopefully it will be the last.

Thank you.

Read full topic

item.source: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this

item.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
item.dc:creator: @Duky190 Duky190
item.description:
@Duky190 wrote:

[quote=“MOHD123, post:13, topic:438327”]Hey bro,

Not trying to offend or do any of that content but, I need to tell you few steps that will make your server successful or get it in a big fame.

Ok, first of all, players will actually look at four points.

  • Stability

  • General Unqiueness

  • Friendly community?

  • Economy.

I have just see you said “help you host”, do you mean manual hosting? Because manual hosting can hold upto 30 players maximumly and I see you use a lot of engine load & memory usage. And your using project insanity which is really bad for stability.

The uniqueness of the server is 0% I can’t see anything unique, if you see what I mean, 1 LITTLE proof would be the home. You could of realized edge is very overused and not is actually unique at all, and the home organization seems :Fp: also I suggest you use newer shop interface,tabs, and use finally 508 maps which is really good looking. Also you need to have something wow to interact and hype your players.

Ah yes, you will need a friendly community because I see allways in most of the servers out there general competition Between donators and normal players I see you have allmost put a lot of features for donators, but it’s over limited. I understand you, more features = more donators, but always remmember normal players are the ones made you money.

Economy which is the worst I see. In a shop I see partyhats? bunny ears? Torva? Claws? Masks? Santa hats? You need to improve that also the drop rates will play a big role. And also set prices… You need to work on that.

This is not all, I will continue it when I’m on computer I’m on iPad haha.

I’m going to take a journey on all server projects and support & help them as possible.

Peace out bro, support.[/quote]
Ok 1, all servers(unless there some rich guy) usualy start out on manual hosting. 2 the shop that u say with phats is a custom point shop look at the subtitles in pictures and the points are hard to get. 3 the donators get barrelchest and super donators get frost dragons. thats not that much. 4 the home is a base it will be changed the community is deciding on one.5 the uniqueness-First off this is my first Project ever. Second- im going for Awarness before uniquness. my objective is to make a server that the community creates. Not some server that a person makes hoping that he will get cash. I want the community to know that im aware of there ideas. But sire thanks for your Umm “suggestions” but i dont care what you say unless your apart of my community. Im new to this. I run of the players itself. This Isnt my Server. this is my communitys server. They determine wether it gets big or not. But one thing i learned since starting this project. UNIQUENESS DOES NOT MATTER! the only thing that matters is the quality of the server. it dosent have to have 508+ maps or gameframes. All it needs Is entertainment and fun for its players. This isnt your server so why do you care? Ive meet people who Point out errors and actually help me and tell me how to fix them. But if your not going to help fix them then dont even post the errors. Let me Find them myself and fix them. But onething in a server that is important is a loyal community which i have and partners to help you with the server. Also another thing about uniqueness. I belive my server is unique. Why because i created IT! and also if all you look at in servers is Uniqueness then you are Very “shallow”. True and Loyal Players look FOR QUALITY! you dont have to support my server i really dont care. The Only opinion that counts is my communities. Not Yours unless i belive it counts. Thanks for the suggestions but if all u look for uniqueness in a server your not very loyal at all. Loyal players look at Quality not uniqueness. they want a server that is diffrent in quality not looks. THEY WANT A SEVER THATS FUN AND ENTERTAINING! uniquness is very low on my importance list. and one last thing! I DONT FUCKING CARE HOW MANY PLAYERS I HAVE ALL I WANT IS LOYAL PLAYERS! i dont care if its 1,30,or even 50 as long as there loyal im happy. If all you look for is quanity of quality then you my friend are “shallow”. im done thanks to moparscape for having no character amount. Also to Whattehp406, i know that.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
item.dc:creator: @MOHD123 MOHD123
item.description:
@MOHD123 wrote:

Hey bro,

Not trying to offend or do any of that content but, I need to tell you few steps that will make your server successful or get it in a big fame.

Ok, first of all, players will actually look at four points.

  • Stability

  • General Unqiueness

  • Friendly community?

  • Economy.

I have just see you said “help you host”, do you mean manual hosting? Because manual hosting can hold upto 30 players maximumly and I see you use a lot of engine load & memory usage. And your using project insanity which is really bad for stability.

The uniqueness of the server is 0% I can’t see anything unique, if you see what I mean, 1 LITTLE proof would be the home. You could of realized edge is very overused and not is actually unique at all, and the home organization seems :Fp: also I suggest you use newer shop interface,tabs, and use finally 508 maps which is really good looking. Also you need to have something wow to interact and hype your players.

Ah yes, you will need a friendly community because I see allways in most of the servers out there general competition Between donators and normal players I see you have allmost put a lot of features for donators, but it’s over limited. I understand you, more features = more donators, but always remmember normal players are the ones made you money.

Economy which is the worst I see. In a shop I see partyhats? bunny ears? Torva? Claws? Masks? Santa hats? You need to improve that also the drop rates will play a big role. And also set prices… You need to work on that.

This is not all, I will continue it when I’m on computer I’m on iPad haha.

I’m going to take a journey on all server projects and support & help them as possible.

Peace out bro, support.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Duky190:

Ok thanks man ill get to work on these as soon as i finish everything and start on fixing the glitches. Right now im wanting to finish everything and then work on the glitches. Also do yo know fixes for any of those glitches. if so i was wondering if you could assist me in the gfx glitches. I am personally horrible with those. Also A note to the player save the the server automatically saves the players progress every 30 seconds to a minute or before they log out. The save button is now bassically usless i no longer need it but thanks for reminding me to remove it. Also yes i know i suck at spelling when im coding. Um My friend Dr Pepper did the gfx since hes better than me at it but we both suck at it. skillstab is gameframe flaw i belive. and ill have to move the barrel chest. So thank you for noticing those glitches for me. I hoped i explanied them the best i could for you. Also how do you think i did with the effigy system? someone asked me to add it today and so i tried my best to get it to actually work. Reply back please.

Talking with you on Skype.

Read full topic
item.source: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this

item.title: Mod Please Remove this! i see now people only care to get money from this
item.dc:creator: @Duky190 Duky190
item.description:
@Duky190 wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:9, topic:438327”][ul][list][quote author=Duky190 link=topic=541042.msg3963706#msg3963706 date=1333505687]

There are a lot of glitches from just the pictures, and there’s always a lot more than that. I suppose that’ll give you something to work on though.

There’s no unique content from what I’ve seen, except those “pepper” points, I don’t see how those fit with RSPS though, and it’s just a basic points system :/. I’d like to see more to this.

Well You kinda put me down there. But Hey im Still Fresh and new to [pi] Servers, i still have to learn from my mistakes, but one benefit im hoping to get out of this is to develop more knowledge on coding [pi]. But how would you rate it for my first attempt at coding a project insanity server? Also please pont out some of the glitches in the pictures so i can jump on it right away and fix em. Btw im trying to keep this on a comunnity base so im trying to get supporters and also people on my website to give me ideas on how to improve the server. But All i need some help. Also thank you for being honest to me. And i made the pepper point system for 2 reasons #1 Dr Pepper a Supreme donator recommended it to me and also #2 i love the Drink Dr Pepper so thats where “peppers” come from.
[/quote]

I’m not trying to put you down, every project has flaws, that’s inevitable. All in all, I don’t see progress being made in the RSPS scene, the few projects I used to have faith in have all been disbanded and any successful servers are corrupted by money now-a-days. Thanks for clearing up that pepper points thing, that makes sense, I love the idea behind those, you’re actually incorporating your passions and your players, I support that.

[list]
[li]barrelchest boss in the fence[/li]
[li]summoning icon placement[/li]
[li]hitmask for overloads[/li]
[li]gfx flaws[/li]
[li]magic logs[/li]
[li]wrong stump id for magic tree[/li]
[li]item lighting[/li]
[li]cape glitches you listed[/li]
[li]player saving is obviously flawed if you have to save in quest tab[/li]
[li]skilltab is older version - not sure if intentional or gameframe mismatch flaw[/li]
[li]no summoning orb[/li]
[li]no formatting in xp counter[/li]
[li]spelling errors[/li]
[/list][/list][/ul][/quote]
Ok thanks man ill get to work on these as soon as i finish everything and start on fixing the glitches. Right now im wanting to finish everything and then work on the glitches. Also do yo know fixes for any of those glitches. if so i was wondering if you could assist me in the gfx glitches. I am personally horrible with those. Also A note to the player save the the server automatically saves the players progress every 30 seconds to a minute or before they log out. The save button is now bassically usless i no longer need it but thanks for reminding me to remove it. Also yes i know i suck at spelling when im coding. Um My friend Dr Pepper did the gfx since hes better than me at it but we both suck at it. skillstab is gameframe flaw i belive. and ill have to move the barrel chest. So thank you for noticing those glitches for me. I hoped i explanied them the best i could for you. Also how do you think i did with the effigy system? someone asked me to add it today and so i tried my best to get it to actually work. Reply back please.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Duky190 Duky190
item.description:
@Duky190 wrote:

Mod please remove this post. im tired of people applying for this and then saying the following!
this is why:
[3:26:37 AM] Saige: Alright, Im sorry but I don’t want to work for you. I find that there are much better servers that I can join, Sorry and goodbye.
[3:26:46 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: wtf
[3:26:58 AM] Saige: You’re not evening paying for a vps.
[3:27:07 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: who said i wasnt
[3:27:15 AM] Saige: You said before we need a host.
[3:27:33 AM] Saige: You’re going to portforward.
[3:27:35 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: yea im not wasting money until this thing gets up
[3:27:55 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: when it goes online therelll be a vps
[3:28:00 AM] Saige: Alright, Im sorry then. I have earn’t 1000’s of dollars out of soul split and
[3:28:29 AM] Jeremiah James Helstrom: D*** WHY THE **** IS IT ALWAYS ABOUT THE DAMN MONEY!
So a mod or staff please close this post im tired of people trying to help and then all they want is money.If you still want to help you better pm me before this topic is closed.
